HIVABM: Agent-based modeling of drug use and HIV spread¶

HIVABM is a python module providing all classes and functions for an agent-based model of drug use and HIV spread.

Note

This documentation assumes general familiarity with Object-Oriented Programming in Python. For an introduction to Object-Oriented Programming in Python see, e.g., here . The module requires NumPy , Matplotlib and NetworkX .
